name: Nice Of You Guys To Drop By (V)
Lore: '''Echo Base, this is Rogue 2. I''ve found them. Repeat. I''ve found them.''',
Text: 'Take Lost In The Wilderness or a Rogue speeder into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR If you occupy a site, find one of your missing characters there. OR Cancel Stunning Leader. OR Cancel opponent''s attempt to randomly remove one or more cards from your hand (except with Monnok).',
